about_the_game:
RPG developed by IMYUIC with the concept of dark fairy tale / multi-scenario system / fantastic all pixel art.



In the boundary called the "Terminus" between human's world and the devil's world,
A spectacular war between humans and demons will unfold.

feature
  • Play time 7-15 hours / 1 route
  • Fairy tale like and fantastic all orijinal pixel art graphics
  • 2D screen, top view field, side view battle, symbol encounter
  • Game screen：1280 × 720
  • Battle part: There are weapon proficiency and magic proficiency, and the more you use your favorite weapon and magic, the higher the number of hits and the effect. As your weapon proficiency increases, you will learn special skills. Parameters increase according to how you fight. You are free to equip which weapons, learn which techniques to grow, and adventure and grow with whom.
  • With the prey system, you can sell monsters defeated in battle as prey and exchange them for money, or make weapons and armor.
  • Story part: Join the Knights, join the mercenaries, go on a solo journey ... or turn over to the enemy ...? It depends on you (player).
    • From the beginning of the story, you are free to gather information and go to various places, or play in the back town regardless of the crisis of the world. Events and endings change depending on the course and choices in the story.
      • Let's go on a trip with your favorite NPC.
      • You can challenge and defeat an obstructive NPC in a battle, you can steal items, or you can seduce them.

      Both story / battle are attractive RPG with a high degree of freedom.

content_descriptors.notes:
Contains  Violence, Gore in pixel art.
Contains  Bad Language.
